General.Name: Citychamp Dartong Co Ltd
General.Description: Citychamp Dartong Co.,Ltd. engages in the real estate development and electromagnetic wires manufacturing businesses in China and internationally. It develops commercial housing and office buildings. The company also sells electromagnetic wires under the Wuyi brand; and develops lithium-ion batteries, chargers, battery modules for electric vehicles, and energy storage batteries and power management systems; and recycling, development, and utilization of waste batteries. Citychamp Dartong Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: Building 1, Crown City Datong Plaza, Fuzhou, China, 350007
